column1: #Text=Isfahan ( Persian : اصفهان , also known as Esfahan ) is a city in central Iran , south of Tehran and is the capital of Isfahan Province .

#Text=The Persians call it " This overview of Fort Lee , NJ , tells about its views of New York City , how to get to Fort Lee by car , bus , ferry or plane , and some of the attractions including Fort Lee Historic Park , a community center with dance , yoga and sports activities , some stores and international cuisine , such as pizzerias , delis , diners and Korean restaurants .
